cab.content:
This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)
REPORT OF SPECIAL WORK OF THE LOCAL GOVERNMENT BOARD
FOR THE WEEK ENDED FEBRUARY 28TH, 1919
1. The Ministry of Health Bill has been read a second time in the House of Commons and referred to a Standing Committee.
2. A Memorandum has been submitted to the War Cabinet with regard to the alledged victimisation of tenants of houses above the rental limits fixed by the Increase of Rents, &c. of 1918.
